settings.text: Up to 33% off when you put your delivery on auto-pilot. And as always, 100% satisfaction guaranteed.
Formulated by dentists with rigorously tested nHa and clean ingredients for optimal oral health.
Tablets arrive with recyclable glass bottles & compostable refill pouches.
Punchy subheader here. Can go over two lines.
settings.text1: Select Your Bottles. Mix and match your favorite formulas
settings.text2: Choose how often. Get delivery right when you need it.
settings.text3: Enjoy Your Custom Combo. Edit or cancel anytime.

settings.title: Original
settings.text_pop: Our signature formula crafted for optimal oral and whole-body health. Packed with rigorously tested clean ingredients including nHa (a naturally remineralizing fluoride alternative), vitamins C + E,  and botanical extracts proven to balance the oral microbiome. Original is the core formula for all Duo tablets—supporting systemic wellness while you brush.

settings.title: Energy
settings.text_pop: Brush your way to a better morning with Duo tablets for mood and metabolism support. We topped off our signature oral microbiome-balancing tablets with a perfectly portioned dose of caffeine (10mg), vitamin B12 (6mcg), and L-theanine (2.5mg) to invigorate your system. A feel-good start to the day.

settings.title: Sleep
settings.text_pop: Prepare for a great night’s sleep with Duo tablets for relaxation and rest. We topped off our signature oral microbiome-balancing tablets with a perfectly portioned dose of melatonin (1.5mg), L-theanine (2.5mg), and lavender to regulate circadian rhythms, ease stress, and ready your system for nourishing rest.

settings.title: Immunity
settings.text_pop: Greet the day with confidence with Duo tablets for vitality and immune support. We topped off our signature oral microbiome-balancing tablets with a perfectly portioned dose of vitamin D3 (30mcg) and vitamin B12 (6mcg) to bolster the body’s defenses and lift mood. Consider it your sunshine on a cloudy day.

settings.title: Better Living Through Toothpaste
settings.text: Whitening toothpaste tablets formulated by two dentists using the best clean ingredients, each one has its own flavor profile and unique benefits.

settings.heading3: Better for you  and the planet

settings.text: A plastic-free upgrade to your daily routine that actually makes a difference. Duo is delivered in apothecary-grade, recyclable glass bottles with compostable refill pouches. It’s the future of toothpaste and better for us all.

settings.title: What’s nHa? And don’t I need fluoride?
settings.description: We use a dentist-backed fluoride alternative called nano-hydroxyapatite (nHa). Exhaustive research over the past several decades has proven that nano-Hydroxyapatite is just as effective as fluoride at remineralizing teeth, while also whitening and reducing sensitivity.

settings.title: Can I pause or cancel my subscription?
settings.description: Yes, you can cancel or pause anytime by going into your subscription portal or by emailing us at friends@duotoothpaste.com.

settings.title: Will I receive bottles or refills in future orders?
settings.description: Your first order of tablets will ship in apothecary-grade glass bottles. Refills will ship in compostable pouches.

settings.title: My bottle broke! How do I get a new one?
settings.description: Do not include this Question on the list
